characterDescription:
Febrth was a companion of Moash and Graves in their camp who made foul-tasting stew.
He claimed to know in which direction the companions should go because he’d been that way before.
He was killed when four supposed Voidbringers entered their camp with the intent of killing them all.

characterDetails.Appearance: He had striking Horneater red hair.
characterDetails.Beliefs: He claimed to have no need for maps because the Passions guided him. Graves told him that he was supposed to have abandoned such superstitions, that he belonged to the Diagram now. Febrth believed he could do both.
